alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 11 at 10:38PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain continues to be possible WHERE...American Samoa WHEN...Through Thursday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. Be prepared for heavy rainfall, which may be slow moving. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 1038 Po Aso Gafua Tesema 11 2023 ...O LOO TUMAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE ASO TOFI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa NOFOAGA...Motu uma TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi. AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele. E tatau ona e fa`alogologo pea i tala o le tau ma nofo sauniuni mo ni lapata`iga o tafega ma lologa e tu`u atu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleele, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
